languages.text: {n}Внезапно улыбка пропадает с изуродованного лица Торговца.{/n} "Почему ты не спасла меня?! Почему не предупредила меня? Отвечай, никчемная тварь, или я вытащу из тебя ответ сама!" {n}Пальцы "Теодоры", не встречая никакого сопротивления, врезаются под скальп Идиры.{/n}

{n}The smile suddenly drops from her mutilated face.{/n} "Why didn't you save me? Why didn't you warn me? Answer me, you insignificant wretch, or I'll drag the answer out of you myself!" {n}"Theodora's" fingers dig into Idira's scalp, meeting no resistance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Внезапно улыбка пропадает с изуродованного лица Торговца.{/n} "Почему ты не спасла меня?! Почему не предупредила меня? Отвечай, никчемная тварь, или я вытащу из тебя ответ сама!" {n}Пальцы "Теодоры", не встречая никакого сопротивления, врезаются под скальп Идиры.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The smile suddenly drops from Trader's mutilated face.{/n} "Why didn't you save me? Why didn't you warn me? Answer me, you insignificant wretch, or I'll drag the answer out of you myself!" {n}"Theodora's" fingers dig into Indira's scalp, meeting no resistance.{/n}
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit

traits.locale_text: {n}The smile suddenly drops from her mutilated face.{/n} "Why didn't you save me? Why didn't you warn me? Answer me, you insignificant wretch, or I'll drag the answer out of you myself!" {n}"Theodora's" fingers dig into Idira's scalp, meeting no resistance.{/n}
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit

languages.text: {n}突然之间，笑容从西奥多拉毁损的脸上消失了。{/n}“你当时为什么没有救我？你为什么没有警告我？回答我，你这只无足轻重的可怜虫！否则我会亲自把答案从你身上挖出来！”{n}“西奥多拉”的手指插进了伊迪拉的头皮，伊迪拉没有进行任何抵抗。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The smile suddenly drops from her mutilated face.{/n} "Why didn't you save me? Why didn't you warn me? Answer me, you insignificant wretch, or I'll drag the answer out of you myself!" {n}"Theodora's" fingers dig into Idira's scalp, meeting no resistance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}突然之间，笑容从西奥多拉毁损的脸上消失了。{/n}“你当时为什么没有救我？你为什么没有警告我？回答我，你这只无足轻重的可怜虫！否则我会亲自把答案从你身上挖出来！”{n}“西奥多拉”的手指插进了伊迪拉的头皮，没有遇到任何抵抗。{/n}
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit

languages.text: {n}La sonrisa desaparece de repente de su rostro mutilado.{/n} «¿Por qué no me salvaste? ¿Por qué no me advertiste? ¡Responde, escoria insignificante, o te arrancaré la respuesta yo misma!». {n}Los dedos de «Theodora» se entierran en el cráneo de Idira sin encontrar resistencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The smile suddenly drops from her mutilated face.{/n} "Why didn't you save me? Why didn't you warn me? Answer me, you insignificant wretch, or I'll drag the answer out of you myself!" {n}"Theodora's" fingers dig into Idira's scalp, meeting no resistance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La sonrisa desaparece de repente del rostro mutilado de la Comerciante.{/n} «¿Por qué no me salvaste? ¿Por qué no me advertiste? ¡Responde, escoria insignificante, o te arrancaré la respuesta yo misma!». {n}Los dedos de «Theodora» se entierran en el cráneo de Idira sin encontrar resistencia.{/n}
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit

languages.text: {n}彼女の傷だらけの顔から、不意に笑顔が消えた。{/n}「どうして助けてくれなかったの？なぜ警告してくれなかったの？答えなさい、この取るに足らぬ惨めな奴、さもなくば、私自ら答えを引きずり出してやる！」{n}『シオドーラ』の指があっさりとイディラの頭皮へと食い込んでいく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The smile suddenly drops from her mutilated face.{/n} "Why didn't you save me? Why didn't you warn me? Answer me, you insignificant wretch, or I'll drag the answer out of you myself!" {n}"Theodora's" fingers dig into Idira's scalp, meeting no resistance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の傷だらけの顔から、不意に笑顔が消えた。{/n}「どうして助けてくれなかったの？なぜ警告してくれなかったの？答えなさい、この取るに足らぬ惨めな奴、さもなくば、私自ら答えを引きずり出してやる！」{n}『シオドーラ』の指があっさりとイディラの頭皮へと食い込んでいく。{/n}
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit

languages.text: {n}Plötzlich verschwindet das Lächeln aus ihrem entstellten Gesicht.{/n} "Warum hast du mich nicht gerettet? Warum hast du mich nicht gewarnt? Antworte mir, du unbedeutendes Gör oder ich reiße die Antwort aus dir heraus!" {n}'Theodoras' Finger graben sich mühelos in Idiras Kopfhaut.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The smile suddenly drops from her mutilated face.{/n} "Why didn't you save me? Why didn't you warn me? Answer me, you insignificant wretch, or I'll drag the answer out of you myself!" {n}"Theodora's" fingers dig into Idira's scalp, meeting no resistance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Plötzlich verschwindet das Lächeln aus dem entstellten Gesicht der Freihändlerin.{/n} "Warum hast du mich nicht gerettet? Warum hast du mich nicht gewarnt? Antworte mir, du unbedeutendes Gör oder ich reiße die Antwort aus dir heraus!" {n}'Theodoras' Finger graben sich mühelos in Idiras Kopfhaut.{/n}
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit

languages.text: {n}Le sourire de la libre-marchande aux traits mutilés s'efface d'un seul coup.{/n} « Pourquoi n'avoir rien fait pour me sauver ? Pourquoi ne pas m'avoir avertie ?! Réponds, misérable larve, avant que j'arrache cette réponse de force ! » {n}Les doigts de « Théodora » s'enfoncent dans le cuir chevelu d'Idira sans rencontrer la moindre résistance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The smile suddenly drops from her mutilated face.{/n} "Why didn't you save me? Why didn't you warn me? Answer me, you insignificant wretch, or I'll drag the answer out of you myself!" {n}"Theodora's" fingers dig into Idira's scalp, meeting no resistance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sourire de la libre-marchande aux traits mutilés s'efface d'un seul coup.{/n} « Pourquoi n'avoir rien fait pour me sauver ? Pourquoi ne pas m'avoir avertie ! Réponds, misérable larve, avant que j'arrache cette réponse de force ! » {n}Les doigts de « Théodora » s'enfoncent dans le cuir chevelu d'Idira sans rencontrer la moindre résistance.{/n}
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit

languages.text: {n}Theodora'nın yaralı yüzündeki gülümseme aniden soluyor.{/n} "Neden beni kurtarmadın? Neden uyarmadın? Cevap ver bana nankör yaratık! Yoksa zorla alırım!" {n}"Theodora", hiç tepki vermeyen İdira'nın kafasına parmaklarını saplıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The smile suddenly drops from her mutilated face.{/n} "Why didn't you save me? Why didn't you warn me? Answer me, you insignificant wretch, or I'll drag the answer out of you myself!" {n}"Theodora's" fingers dig into Idira's scalp, meeting no resistance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaralı yüzündeki gülümseme aniden soluyor.{/n} "Neden beni kurtarmadın? Neden beni uyarmadın? Cevap ver bana, değersiz nankör! Yoksa cevabını zorla alırım!" {n}"Theodora", parmaklarını hiç tepki vermeyen İdira'nın kafasına saplıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit
